content.raw:
mmm looks like there is no `public: static Ogre::Quaternion Convert(const ignition::math::Quaterniond &_q);` function so it tries to implicitly convert to one of the other options but it's ambiguous which one to convert to.

I am testing now to see if adding a new quaternion conversion function will fix it. If that works, I can add the function to `gazebo6` then merge forward from there?
